climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Snuggle into Comfort: Float your way to sleep with a comfy fluffy feeling that you won't get enough of! The soft, lightweight microfibers recreate the luxurious plushness of real down, bringing you amazing huggable softness to indulge in. The silky-smooth cover completes the down-like coziness for you to snooze the night away

Just-right Support: Infused with premium down alternative clusters, the Viewstar queen pillows ensures optimal support for your head and neck, cradling snugly without too much sinkage. It helps encourage neutral spine alignment and will respond nicely to your head position during the night. Meanwhile, it provides sufficient cushioning to promote comfort for truly restorative slumber.

All-the-time Fluffy: Viewstar bed pillow encases plenty of airy polyester fibers which will retain the plumpness all night long - no more struggling to scrunch it up at midnight! The quality fiber core will quickly retake its shape after you tear yourself away, standing perfectly ready for your next bedtime. Constructed well to resist flattening or clumping for long-standing enjoyment

Quality Materials to Trust: Have a peaceful sleep knowing the entire hotel quality pillow is Oeko-Tex Standard 100 certified - meaning all the materials are free from unnecessary materials for confident use. Breathe deeply without worrying about an scratchy nose or face that natural down may lead to, thanks to its pure synthetic fills. The shell in polyester fabrics is airflow-friendly and always smooth-to-the-touch

Hassle-free Use: Thoughtfully made of machine-washable materials that can go right into your home washing machine and dryer. Easy to maintain and will bloom like new even after repeated washing. Sturdy stitching adds to its durability and prevents fill from escaping. Measuring 20" x 30" in queen size set of 2; come vacuum-sealed and will quickly expand to their full size within 24 hours

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Viewstar Bedding Collections Consciously crafted from premium quality fabrics, these dream-worthy pillows are not only designed to delight your everyday sleeping routine, but also to help you become a more successful sleeper. We rise, and we shine.

The Pillow that Rivals the Clouds Down-alternative lovers rejoice! Soft and airy, your viewstar pillow will gently sing you to the land of Nod with dreamy comfort. Indulge yourself with this luxury, plushy feeling which nicely matches the real down clusters.

Sleep with Support Supple Yet Supportive, A Perfect Balance Thanks to its premium microfiber filling, the pillow will snugly nestle your neck and head, gently promoting proper spinal alignment and sleeping posture. They are cushiony enough to help relieve pressure while reactive enough to create personalized support - all for a truly deep, restorative rest.

Your pillows will keep saying: Plump, Plump! Tired of flipping over your pillow in the middle of the night angrily? No worries - your viewstar pillow is generously filled with superior synthetic fibers which will stay perfectly resilient and supportive, providing personalized pleasure all night long. The high durability keeps the pillow away from clumping or flattening overtime, and ensures that it returns to its original shape quickly after every single use for long-term delight.

Previous page Quality we promise Down-like Perfection Poundly filled with selected premium microfibers, bringing superb softness to delight every slumber. Quality we promise Silky Elegance The smooth polyester fabric is so gentle and will keep your skin breathing freely all night long. Quality we promise Designed to Last Strengthened, double-stitched sides help retain shape and further add to the supportiveness. Next page 1 Luxury Fiber Filling 2 Smooth Pillow Cover 3 Gusseted Dual Stitching

Favored by All Sleeping Styles Whether you are a back, side or stomach sleeper, you will sink in just right and get conforming support throughout the night. Also a good company when you read or work (sadly) in bed. We Source Materials Consciously Rest assured knowing your bed is always a safe haven - all materials are certified by Oeko-Tex Standard 100, which means no harmful chemicals will pose a risk to you and your family. Let Machines Do the Cleaning Both the inner core and the cover can be machine washed and dried. Just toss your pillows into the washing machine and tumble them dry for easy home care. And they keep shape!

Ding! What to Expect when Unboxing? Your viewstar pillows will come vacuum-sealed and in a pair of 2. Unwrap carefully with a scissor. Once opened, they will start to inflate and fluff up (the process we so enjoy watching!) Ding! How to Fluff Up? To better help your pillows come to life, give them a full massage - You may beat, shake, and squish them as needed. We suggest waiting 24 hours before the first use, allowing the pillows to grow wonderfully. Ding! Laundry Time! Yep, your pillows are machine washable (thankfully): Set your washing machine to a gentle or delicate cycle with cold water under 40℃/104℉. Please wash only with mild, neutral detergents. Do not bleach. For the best clean possible, we recommend running an extra rinse cycle to make sure the soap is gone completely. Ding! Dry and Refresh For tumble drying, dryer setting matters a lot: Always dry with no or low heat in a delicate cycle. To prevent possible clumping, give your pillows a nice fluff-up after drying. Air drying is recommended. Do not iron. Ding! Newly Upgraded Washing Label How to correctly cut the washed tags? Please follow the small scissors logo on the washable label for correct cutting.Please avoid tearing or improperly cropping the washable label as it may cause the pillow to split.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fluffy and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Very good buy. After fluffing them up per the directions we realized getting 2 a piece might have been over kill lol. But still great pillows, sleeping much more comfortably now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Darn Pillows for Sleeping
reviews.reviewText: Wow! finally some pillows that are darn good to sleep on. I rest much better since I got these pillows. They are firm and really QUEEN SIZE. They are sooooo..comfortable and provide good support to my neck. I love these pillows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These pillows arrived in a very small package so I was kind of worried, but once they were filled with air and fluffed, they were beautiful! That being said, they are a very soft pillow, too soft for me. My husband loves it but I had to go back to my old reliable. If a soft pillow is what you like, these are a great option for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best pillows I've found online!
reviews.reviewText: I'm always a bit hesitant to order pillows online without being able to feel them to know if they will work. These pillows are high quality, hold their shape, and are great for side and back sleepers. Usually pillows flatten super fast and are ineffective for side sleeping, but not these pillows. They hold their shape and have been great to sleep with. My neck problems have almost all gone away at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality - Great Body Pillow
reviews.reviewText: Truly fluffy and thick. I use between my shoulders and knees (I’m 5’2”) and it works better than what I had before. NOT at all lumpy the way some pillows are. GREAT purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these in soft support, they were plumper than expected, slightly firm, but nevertheless very comofrtable to sleep on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Some of the best pillows I’ve had. I’m a side and stomach sleeper and needed something that could handle constant movement at night. I also sleep in the “upside down four” position hugging the pillow. Months in and they are as plush and comfortable as day 1 if not better. Even after washing and drying they are still perfect and haven’t flattened out. Highly recommend. Only con is it took a little longer than expected to get to me, but it was WORTH THE WAIT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the firm pillows, and I must say they are not firm at all. They are thick pillows, very fluffy and plush. I actually thought they were very comfy, but my husband did not like them. They were way too plush for him and got neck pains after.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very comfortable and just enough support for this side sleeper.
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased a new mattress and associated coverings for it and decided that I deserved a new set of pillows as well. For years not, I have been sleeping on a Bamboo memory foam pillow, that while I had become accustomed to it, was quite a hard pillow to sleep on. It was time for something different and after looking at what seemed to be hundreds of different pillows offered here on Amazon, I decided to order these when the price dropped on Prime Days. I am very glad I did.It is simply amazing to receive a relatively small box that contains two quite large, Queen size pillows. I was so amazed at how they had been vacuum compressed and packaged that I neglected to take pictures. It took me just a minute or two to remove both pillows from their plastic bags and watching them expand was a treat. I allowed them a full 24 hours before sleeping on them, which was not an easy thing to do. But it was well worth it. Going from a very hard and heavy pillow to these soft pillows took me a couple of nights of adjustment, but after a few days, I have adapted well to these softer but still supportive pillows.So far, I am very satisfied. I showed them to a neighbour on the day I received them, and they went an ordered a set immediately before the sale ended. At under $40 for two excellent quality pillows, it was really a no-brainer. As usual with anything I purchase, if things change I will include an edit to reflect the change. I don't really see that happening here however. They are just great pillows at any price.
Totalmente de acuerdo, está el la mejor almohada que he usadoLa recomiendo totalmente da un buen soporte sin ser excesivamente dura o suaveNo he amanecido con ningún dolor de cuello desde que las uso
Nice soft and fluffy pillows. Very comfortable to yo sleep on. Might just re purchase the same ones when the next time comes.
I have had these pillows over 6 months now and they are still perfect. The shape holds really well and they are very comfortable. Price is very good for what you get
if a pillow is too comfortable it is hard to wake up. dont take a snap with this one. you will wake up in midnight and going emotional.
